lang_check:
Your language is set to `${langtext}`.
You can change your language with `${prefix}lang list`
lang_usage: Use ${prefix}lang <Your language> to set your language
lang_notonlist: This language is not on the list. Please check!
suggest_ok:
**Your suggestion has been posted!** Thanks for your feedback!

> *If you want to see if your suggestion is accepted or rejected, join the support server in the suggestion channel:*
bug_text: From now on, all bug reports from the bot are moved to the bot's GitHub page, please now send your report to this link
bug_discord: If you don't have a GitHub account, or if it's just a small text issue, you can always reach the support server at this link
error:
Uhh... An error occured.
Please try again
error_reported:
Uhh... An error occured.
The report has been send!
geturl_done: Here is the URL of your file:
geturl_usage: Usage: Send your file with the command `${prefix}geturl` in the text.
geturl_limit2:
**Free users: 8MB**
Nitro users: 50MB

Nitro server boost (for all users):
Level 2: 50MB
Level 3: 100MB
prefix_display:
The server's prefix is `${prefix}`. Type `${prefix}help` for a list of commands.
You can change the server's prefix with `${prefix}prefix set <new prefix>`
prefix_set:
Prefix `${args.join(" ")}` set
:warning: If you can't remember the prefix, mention the bot followed by `prefix`
about_cast:
- **Greep#3022** : Original idea
- **Ajam#3536** : Contributor & some good ideas for the Kingdom of Corona
about_invitebot: Invite the bot in your server
gtn_startdesc:
You started a game of Guess The Number,
you will have to guess a number between ${min} and ${max}.
You have no time limit, and you can resume at any time.

To give your number that you guessed, type `${prefix}gtnguess <Your number>`,
I'll answer you by "lower" or "higher".

Good Luck!
gtn_lower: The number you gave is lower than the one I have
gtn_higher: The number you gave is higher than the one I have
gtn_win:
**__Congratulations!__**

You guessed the correct number in ${try} attempts!
A new number has been generated for you. Good Luck!
gtn_notstarted: You have not started a game of GTN. Please type `${prefix}gtnstart`
gtn_statsresetmsg:
Hello, your stats for the Guess The Number game has been reseted by the owner, thanks!
> If you want to know more, ask Greep#3022 in the bot support server
invite_title: Oh! A new Disney fan, right?
invite_desc:
I am very happy that you are part of the family!
Embark on a magical world on your Discord server!
And, as Walt Disney said: "If you can dream it, you can do it."
twitter_info:
The bot uses a very different starboard system than traditional starboards. Indeed, Discord messages that contain at least 3 ‚≠ê reactions are automatically sent to a Twitter account provided for this purpose.
Don't worry, only the text and, if you have sent one, an image will be sent on Twitter.

This parameter is set by default to send, but you can tell it not to send by doing the command `${prefix}twitter set`
twitter_send: The bot will now send all messages that contain at least 3 star reactions on Twitter
twitter_no_send: The bot will **no longer** send all messages that contain at least 3 star reactions on Twitter
shop_list_footer:
Your balance: ${bal}
üì¶ is the number on your inventory, üì• is the price of buying, üì§ is the price of selling
shop_not_correct_id: You have not given a correct ID, check with ${command}
shop_invalid_args: Your [count] argument is invalid, check your arguments.
shop_buy_not_enough: you don't have enough money to buy ${item}
shop_sell_nothing: you can't sell what you don't have, it makes sense to me too.
inv_total_number1: Total number of items you have:
claim_tip: Tip: vote for the bot and get more money
claim_support: You're a supporter! So you got your daily ${money}.
claim_vote1: You're voted before, so you have ${money1} instead of ${money2}.
claim_vote2: You're voted before, and you're a supporter! So you have ${money1} instead of ${money2}.
use_usage: ID of the item you want to use
use_impossible: Hmm... You can't do anything with this item, sorry!
use_nothing: you can't use what you don't have, it makes sense to me too.
inv_resetmsg: Hello, your inventory has been reseted by the owner, thanks!
loot_nothing: you looked everywhere, even in the trash, but you never found a penny, that's sad!
loot_min: by shaking the water fountain in the city centre, you found ${money}, it's the beginning of the richness.
loot_max: Scrooge saw you and gave you ${money}. Wait? that's weird!
giveaway_help_start:
Start a giveaway, will open a menu pannel if no args. Time must be in w(eeks), d(ays), m(inutes), s(econds).
Example: `${prefix}giveaway start #giveaways 1d 2 Discord Nitro Classic for one month for two people`
giveaway_help_reroll: Reroll latest giveaway or specific giveaway with their ID
giveaway_help_edit: Edits a giveaway, will open a menu pannel
giveaway_help_delete: Deletes a giveaway, will open a confirmation pannel
giveaway_help_list: Lists all giveaways in this server
giveaway_start_menu_channel: First, mention a channel where the giveaway takes place
giveaway_start_menu_notaChannel: This is not a channel, please redo the command to restart the process
giveaway_start_menu_duration: Okay! Now set the duration. It must be in w(eeks), d(ays), m(inutes), s(econds). Example: `2d` for two days, `30m` for 30 minutes etc...
giveaway_start_menu_winners: Great! Now set the number of winners, how many people can win this prize?
giveaway_start_menu_prize: Perfect! Now enter the name of the prize. What will the winners win?
giveaway_start_menu_done: All done! Your giveaway for ${name} has been started at ${channel}, wish good luck to participants! :wink:
giveaway_notFound: No giveaway found for ${ID}, please check and try again
giveaway_edit_menu:
Please select what you want to edit:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Change prize name
2Ô∏è‚É£ Set number of winners
3Ô∏è‚É£ Set new end time
4Ô∏è‚É£ Add/remove time
‚ùå Cancel
giveaway_edit_setNewTitle: Type the new prize name of your giveaway
giveaway_edit_setNewWinners: Type the new number of winners
giveaway_edit_setNewEndTime: Type the new duration from now of the giveaway
giveaway_updated: Success! Giveaway will updated in less than ${time} seconds.
giveaway_noPerms: You don't have sufficient permissions to make/manage a giveaway. You must be at least a moderator or you must have a role with the word "giveaway" on it (like " Giveaway hoster" for example.)
dailyreddit_help_sub:
`${prefix}dailyreddit sub [Subreddit name] [Channel mention] [hour] {Timezone}`
Hour must be a number between 0 and 23 (24hour format, do not pass minutes)
Timezone is optional, default is GMT. You can get the list [on this link](${link})
dailyreddit_help_list: Get a list of subscribed subreddits
